name: 2019 3rd International Conference on Management Engineering, Software Engineering and Service Sciences (ICMSS 2019)--Ei and Scopus
content: ★ Publication: ICMSS 2019 conference proceedings will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. ICMSS 2018 Conference Proceedings has been included in ACM Digital Library and will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus soon.(ISBN: 978-1-4503-5431-8) ICMSS 2017 Conference Proceedings has been included in ACM Digital Library and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. (ISBN: 978-1-4503-4834-8) ★★Contact: Ms. Caroline Miu (Conference Secretary) Email: icmss\_icmss@163.com Tel: +86-13258111117
